description: Styling for the Tic Tac Toe game frontend, defining various CSS variables and styles for the game components.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application styling, including layout and font settings.

classes.name: game-header
classes.description: Styles for the header of the game, including margins.

classes.name: game-title
classes.description: Styles for the title of the game, setting color and font size.

classes.name: game-status
classes.description: Styles for displaying the game status information.

classes.name: board
classes.description: Defines the grid layout for the game board.

classes.name: square
classes.description: Styles for individual squares on the game board with hover effects.

classes.name: game-info
classes.description: Margin settings for game information display.

classes.name: move-list
classes.description: Styles for the move history list in the game.

classes.name: btn
classes.description: Base styles for buttons used in the game, with hover effects.

classes.name: game-container
classes.description: Flex container settings for the game layout.
